Hair:  Hair is considered a sign of beauty by all.  But it has to be clean.  
How can this be done? Hair should be washed with soap or any other 
local cleaning agent once a week or more often, as needed. Combing 
hair at least two times daily will keep it clean. Children who go to school should comb their hair. Children should be checked for head lice.
